scripts.test:pdf: npx tsc --pretty false --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --allowJs true --skipLibCheck --noEmit false --outDir .tmp-test-build tests/pdf.unit.test.ts tests/reports-pdf-controls.unit.test.ts tests/employee-order.unit.test.ts lib/pdf.ts lib/report-pdf-controls.ts lib/employee-order.ts && node --test .tmp-test-build/tests/pdf.unit.test.js .tmp-test-build/tests/reports-pdf-controls.unit.test.js .tmp-test-build/tests/employee-order.unit.test.js
scripts.verify: npm run test:api && npm run test:pdf && npm run lint && npm run build
